duties_responsibilities.duty: Stock and maintain shelves with Nabisco leading brands such as Oreo, Ritz, belVita, Chips Ahoy, Triscuit, and others.
Follow the daily route plan prepared by the operations team to ensure efficient in-store service.
Work closely with sales representative to optimize visibility of Mondelez products on shelves and construct promotional displays.
Enhance seasonal sales, seasonal displays, and new product launches.
Represent Mondelēz in-store with a professional and positive attitude.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver's license and proof of auto insurance
